reviews.review:
What you've seen in videos is very cherry picked. You will have fun as a killer from ranks 20-15, then it will immediately become a chore, you will be harassed, insulted, ddos'd, attacked, hounded down, the whole nine yards, or you will not have fun, (some killer characters or perks really bother people, almost to a comedic level).


Edit: Steam keeps asking me to re-review the game, or edit this one.

Everything still stands, don't.
As a survivor, you will really only have fun with your friends.

It certainly has it's moments, but once you start to see the patterns, the new player oohs and aahs go away, it's a mess. could not recommend this game any less, and I've bought nearly all the dlc.
De longe parecia ruim, olhei de perto parecia que estava de longe..

P.S: максимально краткий обзор

Então... Este jogo, foi abismal.
Tudo começou quando recebi a informação que este jogo estaria de graça, como ja havia o conhecido, tinha visto alguns video jogatinas deste videojogo. No começo com apenas imagens pensava que não serial um tal jogo a minha pessoa, ledo engano, este video gameplay, foi super interessante, adorei esta estetica de de jogo de terror com mini missoes, como posso chamar ao mesmo tempo com online cooperativo, muuuuuuito interessante, legal. Recomendo este jogo, saiba que terá varias... e varias horas de games plaies de jogatina para tomar aaaaaaaltos sustos e muita diversao garantida, segue adiante em anexo um techo de minha fala durante a jameploids.

- AAAAAAAAAAAA mds é o ghost face AAAAAAAAAAA

A really fun multiplayer game, not as scary as it used to be but is pretty fun still. Only problem is that the devs have a hard time balancing the game since it is based off of two sides, each wanting themselves to be stronger, and the occasional bug. It is in a better state than what it used to be though.

DbD is like watching the best parts of a horror movie in 15-20 minutes. There's tension, betrayal, gut-wrenching choices. It's amazing how every match plays out differently. 

Mind you, I've only played survivor but I'm definitely looking forward to playing killer.
Игра в которой на тебя блюют во всех смыслах... 10 из 10 заблёванных сурвов.
Muito bom e engraçado jogar com amigos.
Brings Out The Killer In Me
It Was More Fun In Hell
the game provides a real challenge for people

Original review was a memepost, but this is a tiny real one.

Good game, HORRIBLE community. Sure, the devs kinda suck a*s sometimes, but this is the only game that has consistently kept me coming back to play, as much as I hate it sometimes. It's a love hate relationship. I can deal with the bugs and shi**y map design as it can sometimes even be fun to just fu*k around with both of them; however, I cannot stand the community. I do not see this game whatsoever having any competitive aspect and I feel as if the "competitive" community in this game really destroys the fun of old DBD. More importantly, the people that don't even really play the game. Sure, facecamping is such an easy win for survivors if they understand that facecamping is seriously one of the dumbest f**king things a killer can do in order to win, but it's just so go**amn boring. Nobody gets to play the game in that scenario. I don't care about winning, I don't care if I die, I don't care if my whole team dies, so long as everybody had fun and actually got to play the game is what truly matters to me. Using sweat builds is so mind numbing. All I want to do is do memebuilds or try my own fun build based around memeing with For The People and Mettle of Man, or whatever.

I'll update this in the future, I just felt bad about having it set to a negative review, because the only thing I genuinely dislike about this game is the shi**y community.
Killer or Surviver your getting fucked in some way

Game is awesome, its my go to game for when I don't know what else to do. The suspense I feel while playing it is unlike any other game I've played, I feel genuinely scared at times and occasionally scream in fear. I can't recommend the game play enough. 

The game does not have dedicated servers though, and each game is run on peer to peer connection with the killer as host. So if the killer has shitty internet, you're gonna have a bad time. Thankfully they added a way to see your ping in the lobby and you can leave before the game starts if its too bad.

Плюсы: разнообразие маньяков, небольшая цена, возможность игры с друзьями, окружение делают игровой процесс воистину незабываемым. Частые обновления и добавления в игру новых вещей не дают заскучать.

Минусы: комьюнити. Весь поднимаемый шум по поводу неиграбельности Dead by Daylight происходит именно из-за части игроков. Они не умеют проигрывать, не желают понять других игроков, тем самым портя раунд и игру. Баланс тоже оставляет желать лучшего - к высшему рангу может попасть низший, и наоборот. Ну и вишенкой на торте- использование маньяка и его ПК как хост-сервер для раунда. Некоторые умные хосты намеренно понижают качество соединения в игре, чтобы упростить себе жизнь, что тоже не красит игру. Баги, незначительные и чаще всего возникающие по вине багоюзеров, не портящие игровой процесс, но всё же баги.

Общий итог: со стороны разработчика всё выполнено в лучшем виде, игра развивается и не забывается после первых 20-50 часов, проведённых в ней. Всё остальное возложено на игроков, на их отношение к миру игры. Игра определённо стоит своих денег, позволяет отрешиться от реального мира с его проблемами и погрузиться в Атмосферу. Именно с большой буквы, ведь ради Атмосферы и создана Dead by Daylight.

Recomendo

Really fun asymmetrical 4v1 game. If you're buying this game for the horror aspect of it, don't bother. The game is actual the opposite of scary; none of the killers are really intimidating. The game can be competitive at times, which can be a good or bad thing depending on what you're looking for in a multiplayer game. No friends needed if you are playing killer, however, if you plan on mainly playing as a survivor, friends are a must.

Si te gusta renegar contra pendejos que no hacen objetivos y gente con el internet de un mono este es tu juego ideal :D

Pretty cool, it still has a good community.

Un juego muy intenso, pero aun asi me gusta, muy recomendadooo!!

After 230hours i finally decided to review this game.
It is  ALOT of fun in my opinion, theres always new content coming out.
New maps for free, Killers and survivors arent free but they are not expanssive. i bought all of them and i still plan on supporting the devs with the future content and some cosmetics here and there.

The gameplay is fun, stressful sometimes and intense. I first bought the game to play as killers but i quickly realised theres alot of people being cancer as survivors, the loop around some stuff in the map or spam the vault through a window. Which can be really annoying for a killer because you cant do much versus that unless youre experienced with it. That is the only downside of  Dead  By Daylight imo.

Every killers and survivors are unique and have different perks that you can unlock for other killers/survivors.
As a solo player i still really enjoyed the game by myself for a long time both as killer and survivor. Ive made some friends try the game and they really love it too, were always playing it. 

I highly recommend it,  its totally worth it full price. If its on sale ? get it right now
